pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics or equivalent
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: The game is lightweight and designed to run on most modern systems, but performance may vary depending on the size of battles.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Dual-core 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics with OpenGL 2.0 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: For best performance, especially in larger battles, a faster CPU is recommended.
